channel.title: I need help!
channel.description:
Just so you know, I'm talking about when I start up MoparScape and click Start Server, I want this to happen.
How do I add npc's and change they're drops?
How do I give myself admin? (just for the fun of it)
How do I change my stats so they aren't all just 99, but they're all trainable?
Any help is appreciated. I'm new to this kind of stuff.

item.title: I need help!
item.dc:creator: @Anc13nt_Arr0w Anc13nt Arr0w
item.description:
@Anc13nt_Arr0w wrote:

You spawn Npcs with autospawn.cfg, and you change there drops with NPCDrops.java.

To spawn a NPC:

spawn = NPCID XCOORD YCOORD 0 XCOORD YCOORD XWALK YWALK WALKTYPE Then npc name here.

Basically, the XCOORDS and YCOORDS, are where you want your npc, and XWALK and YWALK is where they can walk to.

Replace ‘Then npc name here.’ with your npcs name. Then save + Compile.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help!
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

Download one from the download section, and click run server and then just log in

item.title: I need help!
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

  1. In your moparscape folder in Program Files
  2. On the built in one, you automatically do.
  3. Your not going to get that with hybridscpae, its ment just to fool around.
